name: Bugge Maze
description:
A tiny spider scuttles around in a dark maze where you can't see much. Use arrow keys to move. There's nothing in the maze because we ran out of time but it's fun to see the little bugge run around.

Credit

  • Victoria Pryde: artwork and design
  • Seong-Young Her: coding
  • Technologies4.me tutorial for tile-based maze game JS code
